statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE optimal_stock < current_stock;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_name DESC, current_stock ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE optimal_stock >= 100 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < 50 AND optimal_stock > 100 ORDER BY optimal_stock ASC;
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > optimal_stock ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name <> 'Supplier A';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM suppliers INNER JOIN inventory ON suppliers.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE suppliers.supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers INNER JOIN inventory ON suppliers.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE suppliers.supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock;
SELECT product_name FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT * FROM stockout_prevention ORDER BY last_ordered_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE optimal_stock < current_stock AND current_stock > 10
SELECT * FROM stockout_prevention WHERE reorder_level < 5 ORDER BY last_ordered_date ASC
SELECT product_name, reorder_level FROM stockout_prevention WHERE last_ordered_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, current_stock_level FROM products
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors
SELECT product_id, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory_levels
SELECT stockout_id, product_id, stockout_date FROM stockouts
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_id, current_stock_level, optimal_stock_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock_level < optimal_stock_level
SELECT product_name, vendor_name FROM products INNER JOIN vendors ON products.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_name FROM vendors
SELECT product_id, COUNT(stockout_id) AS num_stockouts FROM stockouts GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations ORDER BY city, state;
SELECT product_id, location_id, current_quantity, optimal_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < optimal_quantity;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE state = 'CA' AND city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price, supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id ORDER BY unit_price ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.product_name, l.location_name, i.current_quantity, i.optimal_quantity FROM products p JOIN inventory_levels i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN locations l ON i.location_id = l.location_id;
